mapper.insert: insert into supplierfiles (id, Supplier_No, Supplier_Name, Supplier_Address, First_Kind_Id, First_Kind_Name, Second_Kind_Id, Second_Kind_Name, three_Kind_Id, three_Kind_Name, Supplier_Area, Supplier_UsedName, Supplier_Open_Account, Supplier_BankAccount, Supplier_Url, Supplier_Quality_Rank, Supplier_Phone, Supplier_Fax, Supplier_PostalCode, Supplier_FirstContact, Supplier_SecondContact, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, SuPPlier_Buyer, SuPPlier_Buyer_No, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, auditor, auditorTime, CheckMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{threeKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{threeKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierUsedname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierOpenAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierBankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierQualityRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierPostalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierFirstcontact,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierSecondcontact,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierRegistrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierRegistrationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supplierBuyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierBuyerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrartime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update supplierfiles set Supplier_No = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Address = #{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, First_Kind_Id = #{firstKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, First_Kind_Name = #{firstKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Second_Kind_Id = #{secondKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Second_Kind_Name = #{secondKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, three_Kind_Id = #{threeKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, three_Kind_Name = #{threeKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Area = #{supplierArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_UsedName = #{supplierUsedname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Open_Account = #{supplierOpenAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_BankAccount = #{supplierBankaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Url = #{supplierUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Quality_Rank = #{supplierQualityRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Phone = #{supplierPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_Fax = #{supplierFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_PostalCode = #{supplierPostalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Supplier_FirstContact = #{supplierFirstcontact,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Supplier_SecondContact = #{supplierSecondcontact,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SuPPlier_Registrant = #{supplierRegistrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime = #{supplierRegistrationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SuPPlier_Buyer = #{supplierBuyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SuPPlier_Buyer_No = #{supplierBuyerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SuPPlier_Registrant = #{registrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime = #{registrartime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditorTime = #{auditorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CheckMark = #{checkMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, Supplier_No, Supplier_Name, Supplier_Address, First_Kind_Id, First_Kind_Name, Second_Kind_Id, Second_Kind_Name, three_Kind_Id, three_Kind_Name, Supplier_Area, Supplier_UsedName, Supplier_Open_Account, Supplier_BankAccount, Supplier_Url, Supplier_Quality_Rank, Supplier_Phone, Supplier_Fax, Supplier_PostalCode, Supplier_FirstContact, Supplier_SecondContact, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, SuPPlier_Buyer, SuPPlier_Buyer_No, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, auditor, auditorTime, CheckMark from supplierfiles where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, Supplier_No, Supplier_Name, Supplier_Address, First_Kind_Id, First_Kind_Name, Second_Kind_Id, Second_Kind_Name, three_Kind_Id, three_Kind_Name, Supplier_Area, Supplier_UsedName, Supplier_Open_Account, Supplier_BankAccount, Supplier_Url, Supplier_Quality_Rank, Supplier_Phone, Supplier_Fax, Supplier_PostalCode, Supplier_FirstContact, Supplier_SecondContact, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, SuPPlier_Buyer, SuPPlier_Buyer_No, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, auditor, auditorTime, CheckMark from supplierfiles
select * from supplierfiles where checkMark='已审核'

select id, Supplier_No, Supplier_Name, Supplier_Address, First_Kind_Id, First_Kind_Name, Second_Kind_Id, Second_Kind_Name, three_Kind_Id, three_Kind_Name, Supplier_Area, Supplier_UsedName, Supplier_Open_Account, Supplier_BankAccount, Supplier_Url, Supplier_Quality_Rank, Supplier_Phone, Supplier_Fax, Supplier_PostalCode, Supplier_FirstContact, Supplier_SecondContact, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, SuPPlier_Buyer, SuPPlier_Buyer_No, SuPPlier_Registrant, SuPPlier_RegistrationTime, auditor, auditorTime, checkMark from supplierfiles where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from supplierfiles where SuPPlier_RegistrationTime BETWEEN #{time1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{time1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and First_Kind_Id=#{fl1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND Second_Kind_Id=#{fl2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND three_Kind_Id=#{fl3,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from supplierfiles where SuPPlier_RegistrationTime BETWEEN #{time1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{time1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select * from supplierfiles where First_Kind_Id=#{fl1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND Second_Kind_Id=#{fl2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND three_Kind_Id=#{fl3,jdbcType=INTEGER}
